Name: Reforged TD - Tower Defense
About the game: Are you up for a tower defense with RPG elements, like a skill tree and a level system? Are you looking for a game with unique units that have individual abilities and are balanced according to the scissors-stone-paper principle? Then REFORGED TD might be just right for you. Some information about the developers: Behind Reforged Tower Defense there is no big development studio like most games here on Steam. Reforged Tower Defense was developed by me alone. If you have questions, feedback or technical problems with the game, feel free to contact me at any time. I will do my best to answer as soon as possible and offer assistance if necessary. I would also be happy to hear from you if you just had a good time with REFORGED TD. After all, this is the goal of the game. REFORGED Tower Defense offers you: A genre mix of tower defense and RPG An extensive skills tree A range of unique abilities, towers and units Scissors-stone-paper-principle, where each unit shows weaknesses and strengths. Singleplayer and cooperative modes against bots of varying difficulties Frequent content and feature updates
